name: Hilton Grand Vacations
overview: Hilton Grand Vacations Company, LLC, a hospitality company, develops, owns, markets, operates, or franchises hotels, resorts, and vacation ownership properties. The company also manages and operates club membership programs that provide vacation exchange, leisure travel, and reservation services for club members; and offers on-site management services to club resorts, including the operation of owner rental programs, resort recreational programs, and retail outlets. In addition, it operates resale programs for its managed resort properties; and provides customized services to vacation ownership resort developers and owners, such as turn-key development and construction management; marketing and sales; and operations management services. Hilton Grand Vacations Company, LLC was founded in 1992 and is based in Orlando, Florida with regional offices in Marco Island and Sanibel Island, Florida; and sales and marketing offices in Hawaii, Las Vegas, New York, Orlando, Guam and Tokyo. The company operates as a subsidiary of Hilton Worldwide.
